extendedInfo.description: *** ALPHA - UNDER DEVELOPMENT ***We are developing a 3D Tanks game.  This is a proof of concept that has been released solely to test the engine on different devices.Please download, enjoy and give us your feedback.  Sorry in advance for any bugs!Latest update: gameplay enhancements.

reviews.comment: Freakin awesome game! Needs sound and ability to gain extra tanks. All in all, an extremely fun game! Good job! Finally a decent tank game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A lot better than I expected.
reviews.comment: Really good, but the orientation is messed up bad, not that I use it though. And the D-ppad should be switched to a joystick with no deadzone. Would also be cool to be able to move the turret and fire while moving. Good job though.
reviews.author: Eddie Mendoza

reviews.comment: Works well on my Droid. I would like to see sound added, and make the map easier to see.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Orientation of tank and movement not much possible...radar is not clear..much vague. Clumsy...can\'t give it more than 2 stars..not 4-5 stars..Not!.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very cool game would be great to see different buildings ,a level system with power ups or unlockables,inside tank view and more tank colors ,thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great start!
reviews.comment: Played 20 mins on my HTC Panache. Worked great. I\'m looking forward to more development on this. I found it very dark and difficult to see. I would like to see the turret to be semi- automated to help track enemies of choice. It is hard to drive, manage turret rotation plus elevation on the fly. For where this is in development, I am happy with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work freezes phone. Droid. 1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Could be brilliant! Just noticed the separate controls, and the radar. Like it a lot more!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
reviews.comment: Optimums u, runs just fine. Great game it reminded me of ps1 shell shock. Very promising, good luck wish you well!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool but its kind of hard
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Having trouble accessing map, sometimes not working. And where\'s my tank buddy in arcade mode? - HTC Legend
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great alpha, needs sound and the enemy tanks are very hard to get within proper range to shoot, either too far or too close.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: awesome! best 3D game for Android, there are some bugs though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sluggish movement and controls. Can only see white polygons buttons are not seeable. Galaxy s. Hope to see further updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Controls are great but it would be nice to move and turn the turret as well but good no matter
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great for an alpha build!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game. Is cool. It. Needs. Sound. But. I\'m just. Getting. Use. To it. Great. So far. HTC. Evo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rate
reviews.comment: Surprisingly good game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No problems so far but graphics are so 90s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Well, I like the idea. (Kinda reminds me of the Spectre VR games.) Might want to tweak the D-pad sensitivity and turret aim. (Droid 2)
reviews.author: A Google User
